alert.note: Alert for Tangipahoa (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 15 at 7:57PM CDT until April 16 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Louisiana... Tangipahoa River Near Robert affecting Tangipahoa Parish. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tangipahoa River Near Robert. * WHEN...Until tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, Minor flooding near the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:30 PM CDT Friday the stage was 15.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/lix. Click on the Rivers and Lakes menu for forecasts and observations. The next statement will be issued when updates are needed.
